pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Imputation by Mahalanobis Distance Optimization // Imputes missing values of an incomplete data matrix by minimizing the Mahalanobis distance of each sample from the overall mean [Labita, GJ.D. and Tubo, B.F. (2024) doi:10.24412/1932-2321-2024-278-115-123].
